Data: Eranga to Hussey, no run short of length ball angling across, Hussey shoulders arms
Eranga to Hussey, 1 run full ball just outside off, Hussey gets forward and drives that towards sweeper cover, Sri Lanka have a man in the deep though, first run of the day, Australia reach 300
Eranga to Clarke, 2 runs gets forward and Clarke punches this length ball towards sweeper for two this time
Eranga to Clarke, 1 run strays on the pads, 137kph, clipped behind square leg for an easy single
Eranga to Hussey, no run shorter and wider, 139.9kph, Hussey allows it through to the keeper
Eranga to Hussey, no run shorter, closer to off this time, not close enough to make Hussey play, not much swing or seam in that Eranga over
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run Kulasekara starts with a loosener, Clarke chases a very wide delivery, bottom edges it and it dribbles towards the keeper, not the best of strokes from Clarke
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run this one is short of a length and closer to off, Clarke shoulders arms, 123kph
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run a touch fuller, Clarke gets forward as he defends towards cover
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run short of length ball pretty close to off stump, Kulasekara was in that channel all of yesterday, not giving too many freebies for Australia, Clarke defends
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run he isn't get that indipper going yet though, the ball goes straight through as Clarke leaves it for the keeper, 125kph
Kulasekara to Clarke, 1 run back of a length, Clarke stands tall and steers that towards point for a single

Eranga to Clarke, OUT big wicket here, the man in the middle of the purplest of patches has been dismissed early, Clarke nicks to first slip, short of length ball just outside off, seams away a touch, Clarke pokes at it as he moves forward, take the edge, Kumar Sangakkara snaffles it, just the st
Eranga to Wade, no run an attempted yorker first up, good tactic from Eranga, just outside off, squeezed to the of side
Eranga to Wade, no run 140.2kph ball, extra bounce for Eranga, that leaps up at wade from back of a length, Wade was looking to defend and is struck on the gloves
Eranga to Wade, no run angling across, outside off and left alone
Eranga to Wade, no run once again, just outside off, Wade leaves it to the keeper
Eranga to Wade, no run a touch wider outside off, Wade doesn't have to play that one
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run pitched up and just outside off, Hussey plays that straight and firmly to Samaraweera at mid-off, Hussey scrambles through for a single
Kulasekara to Wade, no run leading edge as Wade looks to tuck the ball towards the leg side
Kulasekara to Wade, no run switches back to his outside off line, Wade shuffles across and defends
Kulasekara to Wade, no run gets this one to swerve away, but starting outside off so Wade can leave that easily
Kulasekara to Wade, 3 runs full ball, Wade stretches forward and eases that towards sweeper cover, placed well enough to get three
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run pitched up once more, driven towards extra cover
Eranga to Wade, 1 run back of a length ball on off stump, 137kph, Wade drops it towards points and sets off for a single
Eranga to Hussey, no run good ball this, 138.5kph, pitched up and close to off stump, Hussey leaves confidently
Eranga to Hussey, no run 140.1kph, carries nicely through to the keeper after Hussey shoulders arms
Eranga to Hussey, no run Eranga in the middle of a good spell here, again gets one to bounce at Wade, once again that hits near the handle of the bat
Eranga to Hussey, no run back of a length, 134.6kph, just outside off, Wade allows it through to the keeper
Eranga to Hussey, no run and again, not too wide outside off, Wade watches it through to the keeper
Kulasekara to Wade, no run keeps pegging away at that offstump, 123kph, blocked to the off side
Kulasekara to Wade, no run wider outside off, easy leave for Wade
Kulasekara to Wade, 1 run shorter this time, Wade drops it towards the covers and sets off for a sharp single, Hussey's quick
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run defended solidly off the front foot
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run outside off, that stays a bit low, Hussey happy to leave
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run on middle and leg, defended to the leg side by Hussey
Eranga to Wade, no run nothing loose so far from Sri Lanka this morning, Eranga keeps it close to off, left alone
Eranga to Wade, 2 runs shortish and on leg stump, pulled away towards deep backward square leg, pushes for the second and gets it
Eranga to Wade, 1 run opens the face to drop that ball towards cover, races through for a single
Eranga to Hussey, no run on middle stump, Hussey defends to the leg side, 138kph
Eranga to Hussey, no run back of a length and just outside off, patted back down the track
Eranga to Hussey, no run once again the ball bounces a bit more than the batsman expects, Hussey takes the bottom hand off the bat as he plays that short of length ball
Kulasekara to Wade, 1 run shuffles across and tucks that from off stump towards square leg
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run pitched up, driven towards deep point for one more
Kulasekara to Wade, 1 run angling in towards off stump from round the wicket, tipped to the off side for one more
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run length ball heading for off, crisply driven towards mid-off
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run back of a length ball outside off, poked towards cover for another run, four singles in five balls this over already
Kulasekara to Wade, no run pitched up around off, Wade defends it towards cover, no single this time though
Eranga to Hussey, no run short of length and outside off, left alone by Hussey
Eranga to Hussey, no run blocked back towards the bowler by Hussey, Eranga easily the quickest of the Sri Lankan bowlers, generally in the mid-to-late 130s
Eranga to Hussey, no run pushed towards cover off the front foot
Eranga to Hussey, no run digs in the bouncer, 134.5kph, Hussey sways and half ducks to evade that
Eranga to Hussey, no run length ball is pushed back towards the bowler off the front foot
Eranga to Hussey, no run a maiden from Eranga, keeps probing around off stump, Hussey defends

Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run same line and length, worked to point but not wide enough of the fielder
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run closer to off stump, pushed back towards the bowler
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run on middle stump, blocked out to the off side
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 1 run back of a length ball, worked towards cover off the back foot
Angelo Mathews to Wade, 1 run another tip-and-run single, to cover this time, Australia have had to take plenty of those as the bowling hasn't served up too many loose deliveries this morning
Welegedara to Wade, (no ball) not the greatest of starts, he oversteps, defended by Wade
Welegedara to Wade, no run 128.7kph from Welegedara, outside off, Wade shoulders arms
Welegedara to Wade, 1 run slants this towards leg stump, Wade moves across and guides it down to fine leg, easy run

Welegedara to Hussey, 3 runs short of length ball just outside off, not too wide but wide enough for Hussey to wait on the back foot and chop it towards deep backward point, thought that was going for four but Kulasekara gallops across and dives to stop that, saves a single
Welegedara to Wade, no run defended towards point by Wade, 'Yes,' he shouts early, Hussey starts off, Wade quickly says 'No, sorry,' and Hussey has to scramble back to beat the throw
Welegedara to Wade, no run outside off and Wade shoulders arms
Welegedara to Wade, 1 run moves a long way across to work that from outside off, sends it behind square leg
Angelo Mathews to Wade, no run back of a length ball, comfortably defended
Angelo Mathews to Wade, no run Wade flirts with that one outside off but doesn't kiss it through to the keeper, sucked in by the angle
Angelo Mathews to Wade, no run gets well forward and pushed towards cover
Angelo Mathews to Wade, no run close to off stump, 122.5kph, jabbed towards point
Angelo Mathews to Wade, no run back of a length ball that on off stump, Wade didn't think it would rise as much as that did, takes the bottom hand off the handle as he plays that
Angelo Mathews to Wade, no run more defence to mark half-time in the first session, drinks
Welegedara to Hussey, FOUR runs short of length ball on legstump, easy for Hussey to thump that to the midwicket boundary, Hussey moves to 49
Welegedara to Hussey, 1 run pushes the ball to mid-off to get another half-century for Hussey, appropriately reaches there with a single, 29 singles in his 50 this innings
Welegedara to Wade, no run
Welegedara to Wade, 1 run waits on the back foot and steers that towards deep point

Welegedara to Hussey, FOUR runs pitched up and outside off, Hussey was looking to thread that through the covers, gets a thick outside edge past gully for four, after only one boundary in his innings before the start of this over, he has two in his previous three balls
Welegedara to Hussey, no run outside off and that is left alone by Hussey
Angelo Mathews to Wade, no run blocked to the off side
Angelo Mathews to Wade, no run short of length ball on the pads, defended back towards the bowler
Angelo Mathews to Wade, 1 run short of length ball outside off, slapped to deep point, Wade has picked up quite a few singles there this morning
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 1 run 120.5kph, Hussey taps an offstump ball in the direction of cover and zips through for a single
Angelo Mathews to Wade, no run pitched up, just outside off, Wade stretches forward and blocks to the off side

Angelo Mathews to Wade, no run back of a length, 118kph, outside off and that is carved towards gully, Angelo's bowling average is now 77.55, only one five-for in first-class cricket for him, averages 46 there
Welegedara to Hussey, no run that stays low outside off, bounces a second time before reaching the keeper
Welegedara to Hussey, no run closer to off, shorter as well, Hussey jumps to get on top of that as he defends, 128kph
Welegedara to Hussey, no run 128.9kph, just outside off, blocked off the back foot to the off side

Welegedara to Hussey, no run length ball heading for off stump, defended in the direction of mid-on

Angelo Mathews to Wade, no run short of length ball on leg stump, Wade can't connect properly as he looks to work it to square leg
Angelo Mathews to Wade, no run just outside off, defended towards cover off the front foot, nothing happening for Mathews here, can't be too long before Herath comes on
Angelo Mathews to Wade, 1 run a touch short, carved towards deep point for a single

Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run beaten! 123.3kph, for the past few overs Australia have had it fairly easy, this one from Mathews jumps up, scrambled seam perhaps hitting a crack and moves away to go past the outside edge

Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run outside off, defended towards the off side

Welegedara to Wade, no run that has been reviewed for an lbw, umpire turned it down, bit of a clutching-at-straws review actually, looked to be hitting well outside off, replays show that it was, Wade was looking to play that towards extra cover
Welegedara to Wade, no run gets well forward and defends to the off side

Herath to Wade, 1 run down the leg side, helped along to fine leg
Herath to Hussey, 1 run pitched up, eased towards long-on for a single, Hussey an do that all day, he probably intends to

Herath to Wade, no run gets back and punches it towards cover, 'Wait in,' he says

Eranga to Hussey, no run beaten outside off, Hussey flirts with that one from Eranga, just some slight seam movement away for Eranga there
Eranga to Hussey, no run pitched up and well outside off, driven towards cover
Eranga to Hussey, FOUR runs Hussey plays that well to bring up the 100-run stand, waits for it and slashes it behind point for four, he's now 90*

Dilshan to Hussey, no run length ball angling in, pushed back towards the bowler
Eranga to Wade, FOUR runs shot! short ball from Eranga, 134kph, lashed that to the square leg boundary, no chance for deep midwicket or deep backward square leg, likes the pull shot Wade
Eranga to Wade, 1 run pushed towards cover for a single

Eranga to Hussey, FOUR runs dropped, Hussey has a big grin on his face as he reaches century No. 19, a moment earlier he was in despair after he pulled that one, towards Angelo Mathews at deep midwicket, Mathews had to back pedal a bit, Mathews is in position to take it though, should have taken

Dilshan to Wade, 1 run gets a single to point, time for drinks
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run hint of swing for Kulasekara, Hussey drives the full ball towards extra bounce

Here's what some of our readers think of the declaration.

surprise! Australia have declared, quite an adventurous decision from Michael Clarke, still plenty of time left in the day today, it is a substantial total but not exactly a mammoth one. Another bold decision from a man making his name as a positive captain. Must have taken into account the forecast for
12.20pm Covers coming off After a short but heavy shower, the rain has stopped. They are drying the outfield now. Will keep you post on start time.
12.25pm Lunch taken early. Next session 1-3:20, then from 3:40 to 5:51.
12.55pm Five minutes to re-start. Sri Lanka have already had their best session of the match this morning, and Australia are a bowler short for the second time in three Tests.
Lyon to Angelo Mathews, no run length ball from Lyon to start the session, pushed towards mid-on, plenty of chat from Wade
Lyon to Angelo Mathews, no run solidly defended by Mathews
Lyon to Angelo Mathews, no run length ball spins in a little, Mathews happy to leave that one outside off
Lyon to Angelo Mathews, no run length ball on off stump, Mathews stretches forward and defends
Lyon to Angelo Mathews, no run turns in from outside off, Mathews shoulders arms, hits high just above the knee roll and well outside off, an lbw appeal but that was too high
Lyon to Angelo Mathews, no run defended to the right of the bowler

Starc to Dilshan, no run nearly a wicket first up, short of length ball just outside off, not much room for Dilshan but he decides to have a crack at it, looking to send it towards point and he is beaten
Starc to Dilshan, 2 runs steps forward and square drives it behind point for a couple
Starc to Dilshan, no run full and on the pads, 140.3kph, eased towards mid-on

Starc to Dilshan, no run didn't carry to slip, pitched up and outside off, Dilshan goes for the drive this time, a healthy outside edge, bounces through to slip
Starc to Dilshan, no run well outside off and that is left alone
Lyon to Angelo Mathews, no run Mathews jumps down the track and wanted to shovel that towards midwicket, Lyon getting some turn from the footmarks, inside-edged on to his pads
Lyon to Angelo Mathews, no run skips down again, pushes back towards the bowler
Lyon to Angelo Mathews, no run solid forward defensive this time
Lyon to Angelo Mathews, no run tossed up, length ball on off stump, blocked down the track

Lyon to Angelo Mathews, no run slapped off the back foot towards point, good over that from Lyon
Starc to Dilshan, no run good line and length there, targetting off stump, Dilshan drives that towards mid-off
Starc to Dilshan, no run mistimed as Dilshan drives on the up towards extra cover, the bat turned in his hands as he played that shot
Starc to Dilshan, no run good delivery there, has Dilshan fishing at it outside off, the angle takes the ball away, it was short of a length, Dilshan is drawn towards it and is beaten

Lyon to Kulasekara, no run fuller and a little outside off, forward defence

Lyon to Kulasekara, no run hit high on the blade, the ball rolls away towards point

Siddle to Herath, OUT oh dear, the Herath show is over much too soon, and we didn't even get to see one of his classic strokes, and it ends with an absolute shocker of a decision from Tony Hill, massive inside-edge as Herath looked to defend that one, that too with the bat a long way from the pa
Siddle to Eranga, no run length ball on middle and off, pushed back towards the bowler
Siddle to Eranga, 1 run Warner is super quick across the turf, Eranga pushed the ball to cover, Warner races across to field that and shies at the non-striker's end
Siddle to Kulasekara, FOUR runs wide outside off, Kulasekara swipes at it, edges it towards deep backward point for a boundary
Siddle to Kulasekara, 1 run Kulasekara looks to leave that one but lifts the bat too late, off the bottom of the bat and to the left of the keeper, Siddle has plenty to tell Kulasekara
Siddle to Eranga, FOUR runs superb off drive, all along the ground, it was pitched up and that is a shot a top-order batsman can be proud of
Lyon to Kulasekara, SIX runs gets on one knee and hammers that from well outside off to the midwicket boundary, catch is taken by a spectator on the grass bank
Lyon to Kulasekara, no run defended this time by Kulasekara
Lyon to Kulasekara, no run more solid defence from Kulasekara

Lyon to Eranga, no run full and wide, looks to power that through the off side, he misses, the bails come off, but think he was in the crease, now there is a review over whether he nicked it, don't think he did, Hot Spot shows nothing
Lyon to Eranga, no run charges down the track and looks for the big hit, can only push it as far as mid-off
Siddle to Welegedara, no run struck on the pads there, Siddle asks the question but that looked to be going down
Siddle to Welegedara, no run fresh-airs it outside off, looking to crash it towards cover
5.15pm Rain A light drizzle in Hobart, the covers are out.

So Australia take a 114-run lead despite the best efforts of Tillakaratne Dilshan and Angelo Mathews. Siddle was relentless today, easily the best of Australia's bowlers today, giving away little all through his spell even after Hilfenhaus went off injured and Starc proved wayward.
